title: KüA Plan Day Time Schedule
description: Information about the outline of a single day's schedule of an event, represented in the KüA-Plan.

sections.description: Rough subdivision of a day into sections like 'morning', 'afternoon', 'night', etc. that are used to divide the KüA-Plan main list with subheadings.

name.description: Name of this schedule section, i.e. the subheading above this section.

endTime.description: End of this section. Interpreted as local time in the event's timezone. Must be `null` in the last section. When it is equal to the event's `effectiveBeginOfDay`, this section gathers only the ongoing entries from previous event days.
